h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat
content: As you head up the stone stairs, look for a small pathway on the left where Zhu Bajie will point out a small enclosure. Be ready to deal with both a Falcon Fan-Maker and Cyan Bat. Shut down the Falcon with Immobilize so you can quickly remove the bat, and then focus your attention on defeating the stronger falcon enemy.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
As you head up the stone stairs, look for a small pathway on the left where Zhu Bajie will point out a small enclosure. Be ready to deal with both a Falcon Fan-Maker and Cyan Bat. Shut down the Falcon with Immobilize so you can quickly remove the bat, and then focus your attention on defeating the stronger falcon enemy.
